properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 2 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...Gainesville Lock and Dam...and Demopolis Lock and Dam

.Heavy rainfall of three to four inches is forecast during the
next 48 hours across much of the Tombigbee River basin...and a flood
warning remains in effect along the Tombigbee.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam.
* from Friday evening until further notice...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 83.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 101 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday evening and continue
to rise to near 107.3 feet by Monday morning. The river will then
begin to fall by Monday afternoon.
* Impact...At 109 feet...Flooding of some camps and cabins...as well
as widespread flooding of low-lying woods and agricultural lands...
occurs, especially ustream of the lock and dam. At 101 feet...
flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
